SYSTEM: 4._methodologies-Concpt-REEng.pdf: Página 2
Ontological Engineering 
©Asunción Gómez-Pérez,
METHONTOLOGY. Tasks in the conceptualization activity
METHONTOLOGY proposes to
organize
the
informally
perceived view of a domain
using a set of intermediate
representations (IRs) based
on tabular and graph notations
that can be understood by 
domain experts and ontology
developers.
speaker: SYSTEM
